metadata.title: CVE-2021-3428 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: kernel: integer overflow in ext4_es_cache_extent Wolfgang Frisch discovered that the ext4 file system implementation in the Linux kernel contained an integer overflow when handling metadata inode extents. An attacker could use this to construct a malicious ext4 file system image that, when mounted, could cause a denial of service (system crash).
